posts.post_content:
Cycle 460 SGC 60....Incredible card that is close to NM except for top to bottom centering. Sharp corners, extremely clean back. HOFer's with Cycle 460 backs are pretty tough...$1475 delivered gets it, thanks...Now Only $1385..**SOLD**

Sov. 350 Apple green SGC 80....solid white borders, extremely clean card front and back.....$650 delivered....Now only $575.**SOLD**
Card now available for $1850, thanks for looking..
Will sell for $1475, a couple of recent Cycle 460 HOFers in 5's have sold for $2500-3000. Thanks for looking...
Beautiful card Kevin, good luck with the sale my friend
Thanks Roy, second Joss card added....thanks
